title.rendered: Inauguration Lecture on the Topic: “Deepening Democracy for Integration and Development” delivered by His Excellency, Uhuru M. Kenyatta

content.rendered:
Ahead of the Presidential inauguration fixed for 29/5/2023, the Inauguration Lecture on the Topic: “Deepening Democracy for Integration and Development” delivered by His Excellency, Uhuru M. Kenyatta, former President of Kenya held today, 27/5/2023.
The Presidential Inauguration Exhibition themed: “Nigerian Art: Hope Renewed… Limitless Possibilities” also held at the International Conference Centre, Abuja.
